name: End of Line
description:
End of Line on Play

All jobs have risks. Whiskey knew that and that if you go swimming with sharks you might just get bit. But for the kind of money Johnny was offering for just a few hours work, how can he possibly refuse?

A cyberpunk adventure game created as part of #cyberpunkjam.
Inspired by many of the classic from the genre. Can you spot all the references?
